data.text: Ah, McQueen!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Ah, McQueen!

data.text:
Ryan and Bright, are you 
planning to start training now too?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Ryan and Bright, are you 
<story>planning to start training now too?

data.text:
Yes, The [Hanshin Daishoten] is 
approaching so it's time to dive in～
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Yes, The [Hanshin Daishoten] is 
<story>approaching so it's time to dive in～

data.text: Spe-chan over there is going to enter too, right?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Spe-chan over there is going to enter too, right?

data.text: Yes, as a warm-up before the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes, as a warm-up before the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text:
So it's finally our first shot at the 
"Golden Generation's" Derby Uma Musume, huh～?
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>So it's finally our first shot at the 
<story>"Golden Generation's" Derby Uma Musume, huh～?

data.text:
We had the opportunity to see her previous race, 
and it was a very deeply moving experience～.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>We had the opportunity to see her previous race, 
<story>and it was a very deeply moving experience～.

data.text:
……However, no matter who my opponent is, right now the only thing 
I need to do is continue to refine myself.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>……However, no matter who my opponent is, right now the only thing 
<story>I need to do is continue to refine myself.

data.text:
Bright was last year's [Hanshin Daishoten] champion, 
and then went on to conquer the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Bright was last year's [Hanshin Daishoten] champion, 
<story>and then went on to conquer the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text:
Victory is natural ― is the frame of mind 
we'll be approaching this with.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Victory is natural ― is the frame of mind 
<story>we'll be approaching this with.

data.text: …… certainly with the dignity of a champion, I see.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…… certainly with the dignity of a champion, I see.

data.text:
Well then, let's get started with training. 
See ya later, McQueen!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Well then, let's get started with training. 
<story>See ya later, McQueen!

data.text: Good day to you～.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>Good day to you～.

data.text:
Trainer-san and Special Week-san, it seems you won't be able to 
afford letting your opponent take advantage of any mistakes.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san and Special Week-san, it seems you won't be able to 
<story>afford letting your opponent take advantage of any mistakes.

data.text:
Special Week's next races was quickly approaching. It was about 
time we put the finishing touches on her preparations, however……
data.processed:
<story>Special Week's next races was quickly approaching. It was about 
<story>time we put the finishing touches on her preparations, however……

data.text: Haa…… Haa…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa…… Haa…

data.text: …For something of this level to wear you out, it's not like you.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>…For something of this level to wear you out, it's not like you.

data.text: …I-I'm sorry……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…I-I'm sorry……

data.text:
After a quick break, let's give it one more 
go! [Repetition becomes strength]! I don't know 
if there's a saying like that though!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>After a quick break, let's give it one more 
<story>go! [Repetition becomes strength]! I don't know 
<story>if there's a saying like that though!

data.text: Yes, please……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yes, please……

data.text:
As I thought, Silence Suzuka's situation seems 
to be weighing on her mind. She continues to 
be unable to focus on running, it seems.
data.processed:
<story>As I thought, Silence Suzuka's situation seems 
<story>to be weighing on her mind. She continues to 
<story>be unable to focus on running, it seems.

data.text: Trainer-san, excuse me.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, excuse me.

data.text: Tazuna-san, how may I help you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Tazuna-san, how may I help you?

data.text:
Yes, the [Monthly Twinkle] has requested to do an article. It 
seems they'd like to put together a special report about team .
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Yes, the [Monthly Twinkle] has requested to do an article. It 
<story>seems they'd like to put together a special report about team .

data.text: Hey hey hey! [Monthly Twinkle] really gets it, huh?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hey hey hey! [Monthly Twinkle] really gets it, huh?!

data.text: Being part of a special report, sounds amazing……!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Being part of a special report, sounds amazing……!

data.text:
Fufuu, well then, I've been entrusted with a questionnaire 
for each of the team members, so I'll have them 
sent to the trainer's room later.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, well then, I've been entrusted with a questionnaire 
<story>for each of the team members, so I'll have them 
<story>sent to the trainer's room later.

data.text: Thank you very much, I appreciate it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Thank you very much, I appreciate it.

data.text:
Oh, and one more thing― truthfully, there's a former trainer 
who's had experience overseas that happens to be on campus.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>Oh, and one more thing― truthfully, there's a former trainer 
<story>who's had experience overseas that happens to be on campus.

data.text:
And when I spoke with them about Silence Suzuka, 
they said they'd love to take a look at her running.
data.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
data.processed:
<story>And when I spoke with them about Silence Suzuka, 
<story>they said they'd love to take a look at her running.

data.text:
That's quite fortunate, isn't it? 
Perhaps we'll be able to get some advice.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That's quite fortunate, isn't it? 
<story>Perhaps we'll be able to get some advice.

data.text:
Suzuka, since we have the chance, 
how about having them take a look at your running?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka, since we have the chance, 
<story>how about having them take a look at your running?

data.text: Yes, I look forward to it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes, I look forward to it.

data.text: Suzuka-san……!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Suzuka-san……!!

data.text: Spe-chan……?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Spe-chan……?

data.text: ……Ah, um… no, it's nothing…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……Ah, um… no, it's nothing…

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>………

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>………

data.text:
On the course right now, Silence Suzuka was running, 
in order to get some advice from a former trainer 
who had experience overseas.
data.processed:
<story>On the course right now, Silence Suzuka was running, 
<story>in order to get some advice from a former trainer 
<story>who had experience overseas.

data.text: Watching her from afar, was Special Week.
data.processed: <story>Watching her from afar, was Special Week.

data.text: So you were here, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>So you were here, Spe.

data.text: So you were here, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>So you were here, Spe.

data.text: Trainer-san……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san……

data.text:
I surprised even myself. About Suzuka-san, 
without thinking I almost tried to stop her……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I surprised even myself. About Suzuka-san, 
<story>without thinking I almost tried to stop her……

data.text:
Since you've come to the academy, you've been together with 
Suzuka-san the whole time, after all. I think it's only natural 
that you'd be anxious.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Since you've come to the academy, you've been together with 
<story>Suzuka-san the whole time, after all. I think it's only natural 
<story>that you'd be anxious.

data.text:
Since you've come to the academy, you've been together with 
Suzuka-san the whole time, after all. I think it's only natural 
that you'd be anxious.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Since you've come to the academy, you've been together with 
<story>Suzuka-san the whole time, after all. I think it's only natural 
<story>that you'd be anxious.

data.text:
……Even now I remember it very clearly. 
The first time I saw Suzuka-san's running figure.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……Even now I remember it very clearly. 
<story>The first time I saw Suzuka-san's running figure.

data.text:
Coming here all the way from Hokkaido, unsure whether things 
would even go well, I saw Suzuka-san running―
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Coming here all the way from Hokkaido, unsure whether things 
<story>would even go well, I saw Suzuka-san running―

data.text:
Like they were being drawn strongly to her, 
I couldn't take my eyes off of her.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Like they were being drawn strongly to her, 
<story>I couldn't take my eyes off of her.

data.text:
Ever since then, I've wanted to be able to run 
like Suzuka-san, and I've continued to watch her, but……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ever since then, I've wanted to be able to run 
<story>like Suzuka-san, and I've continued to watch her, but……

data.text: After saying all that, Special Week feel silent.
data.processed: <story>After saying all that, Special Week feel silent.

data.text:
It seems she herself, realized just how heavily she was relying 
on Silence Suzuka's running to support herself.
data.processed:
<story>It seems she herself, realized just how heavily she was relying 
<story>on Silence Suzuka's running to support herself.

data.text: She turned her gaze towards Silence Suzuka on the course―
data.processed: <story>She turned her gaze towards Silence Suzuka on the course―

data.text:
When I first laid eyes on Silence Suzuka's running, 
I couldn't help but get the impression that she 
was an Uma Musume who enjoyed running.
data.processed:
<story>When I first laid eyes on Silence Suzuka's running, 
<story>I couldn't help but get the impression that she 
<story>was an Uma Musume who enjoyed running.

data.text:
Before long, she found her own running style, and her 
running exceeded the expectations of everyone who saw her……
data.processed:
<story>Before long, she found her own running style, and her 
<story>running exceeded the expectations of everyone who saw her……

data.text:
……Spe, you were drawn to Suzuka's running 
because you wanted to be like that, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……Spe, you were drawn to Suzuka's running 
<story>because you wanted to be like that, right?

data.text: ……Yes.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……Yes.

data.text: Then, what exactly about Suzuka's running drew you to it?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Then, what exactly about Suzuka's running drew you to it?

data.text:
Eh……? What? That's… 
because it's pretty and cool……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Eh……? What? That's… 
<story>because it's pretty and cool……

data.text:
And it gave you a dream. You thought about 
what kind of run she would show us next time too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And it gave you a dream. You thought about 
<story>what kind of run she would show us next time too.

data.text:
Yeah……! That's right! Suzuka-san's running 
always exceeded my expectations!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah……! That's right! Suzuka-san's running 
<story>always exceeded my expectations!

data.text:
That's why, more and more, I wanted to keep watching 
Suzuka-san run! Her consecutive victories at [Osaka 
Hai] and the [Takarazuka Kinen], and then―
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's why, more and more, I wanted to keep watching 
<story>Suzuka-san run! Her consecutive victories at [Osaka 
<story>Hai] and the [Takarazuka Kinen], and then―

data.text: Ah……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah……

data.text:
For her dream of "Wanting to see 
the scenery", Suzuka continues to run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>For her dream of "Wanting to see 
<story>the scenery", Suzuka continues to run.

data.text:
Because Suzuka is running with those 
straight-forward feelings, me and Spe are both drawn to her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Because Suzuka is running with those 
<story>straight-forward feelings, me and Spe are both drawn to her.

data.text:
Because Suzuka is running with those 
straight-forward feelings, me and Spe are both drawn to her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Because Suzuka is running with those 
<story>straight-forward feelings, me and Spe are both drawn to her.

data.text:
……if Suzuka goes over seas, she'll probably 
show us an even more extraordinary run than before.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……if Suzuka goes over seas, she'll probably 
<story>show us an even more extraordinary run than before.

data.text:
……if Suzuka goes over seas, she'll probably 
show us an even more extraordinary run than before.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……if Suzuka goes over seas, she'll probably 
<story>show us an even more extraordinary run than before.

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>………

data.text: ……that's right, of course that'll be what happens……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……that's right, of course that'll be what happens……!

data.text:
Suzuka-san will run to the ends of the Earth! 
All of our expectations, she'll easily blow them all away!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san will run to the ends of the Earth! 
<story>All of our expectations, she'll easily blow them all away!

data.text:
That's the way that the Suzuka-san I look up 
to runs…… ……Something like stopping Suzuka-san…… 
I can't do something like that……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's the way that the Suzuka-san I look up 
<story>to runs…… ……Something like stopping Suzuka-san…… 
<story>I can't do something like that……!

data.text:
Just like Suzuka― to catch up to 
Suzuka, Spe you need to work hard.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just like Suzuka― to catch up to 
<story>Suzuka, Spe you need to work hard.

data.text:
Just like Suzuka― to catch up to 
Suzuka, Spe you need to work hard.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just like Suzuka― to catch up to 
<story>Suzuka, Spe you need to work hard.

data.text: Ehehe…… Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehe…… Yeah!

data.text:
The stands are packed here at the Hanshin Race course. With the 
Main Race approaching, the enthusiasm in the air begins to swell!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The stands are packed here at the Hanshin Race course. With the 
<story>Main Race approaching, the enthusiasm in the air begins to swell!

data.text:
All the attention is on the "Golden Generation's" 
Special Week and last year's champion, Mejiro Bright!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>All the attention is on the "Golden Generation's" 
<story>Special Week and last year's champion, Mejiro Bright!

data.text:
With the [Hanshin Daishoten] being the first time these 
two face off, just what kind of result awaits us?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>With the [Hanshin Daishoten] being the first time these 
<story>two face off, just what kind of result awaits us?!

data.text:
Rainy with a Heavy course…… I need to focus on preserving stamina 
in this race…… I definitely need to avoid rushing at the start……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Rainy with a Heavy course…… I need to focus on preserving stamina 
<story>in this race…… I definitely need to avoid rushing at the start……

data.text:
Yeah, that's fine. Most likely, the pace will be 
somewhat slow, so it'll be easy to focus on those in the front.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, that's fine. Most likely, the pace will be 
<story>somewhat slow, so it'll be easy to focus on those in the front.

data.text: Hmm hmm… I see……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Hmm hmm… I see……!

data.text:
The straight on the Hanshin 3000m, isn't very long 
and there's a hill too. So go all out from the third corner!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>The straight on the Hanshin 3000m, isn't very long 
<story>and there's a hill too. So go all out from the third corner!

data.text:
……Um… Gold Ship-san's advice, 
it's really hard to tell if you're joking or serious…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……Um… Gold Ship-san's advice, 
<story>it's really hard to tell if you're joking or serious…

data.text:
How rude! When you think of the 
[Hanshin Daishoten] it's gotta be me, right?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>How rude! When you think of the 
<story>[Hanshin Daishoten] it's gotta be me, right?!

data.text:
Before you start spouting off about the [Hanshin Daishoten], 
you should probably debut first!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Before you start spouting off about the [Hanshin Daishoten], 
<story>you should probably debut first!

data.text:
With that said, to think her flight would be the same day as the 
race, it's unfortunate Suzuka-san couldn't be here……
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>With that said, to think her flight would be the same day as the 
<story>race, it's unfortunate Suzuka-san couldn't be here……

data.text:
Ah, no! I'm the one that suggested 
that she should leave today.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ah, no! I'm the one that suggested 
<story>that she should leave today.

data.text:
So Suzuka-san can leave and run overseas with peace of mind― 
I'll show Suzuka-san that even if we're apart, I can still do it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>So Suzuka-san can leave and run overseas with peace of mind― 
<story>I'll show Suzuka-san that even if we're apart, I can still do it!

data.text:
So that's how it was. In that case, 
you definitely have to win, don't you?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>So that's how it was. In that case, 
<story>you definitely have to win, don't you?

data.text:
Yeah, right now Spe has everyone's feelings backing her up. 
Roll up your sleeves and respond in kind.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, right now Spe has everyone's feelings backing her up. 
<story>Roll up your sleeves and respond in kind.

data.text:
Yeah, right now Spe has everyone's feelings backing her up. 
Roll up your sleeves and respond in kind.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, right now Spe has everyone's feelings backing her up. 
<story>Roll up your sleeves and respond in kind.

data.text: Yeah! I'll be heading out!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! I'll be heading out!
